title: The GTF parser is too strict and can't read newest gencode human annotations

content.raw:
Segtools-aggregation expect the input annotation to have both a transcript_id and gene_id field in the attribute column.

However I noticed that newer gencode human annotation, at least from the version 24, removed the transcipt_id field the row represent a 'gene' annotation (featuretype == 'gene').

The first line of GTF file from encode is usually a 'gene' annotation which causes segtools to stop directly after parsing the first line.

One solution is to artificially add add a 'transcript_id' key to the attributes dictionary of the parser if featuretype == 'gene'.
